Full Description: Akamas is the autonomous optimization platform that maximizes application performance, service reliability, and cloud cost savings.  Akamas helps performance engineers, developers, DevOps, platform engineers, and SREs be more productive, prevent incidents, and achieve aggressive optimization goals at enterprise scale.  Unlike infrastructure-focused cloud optimization tools, Akamas is application-aware, meaning that it optimizes full-stack configurations, taking into account application performance and reliability signals, SLOs, and user-defined constraints.  With support for both continuous optimization of live applications in production environments, and automated performance tuning of applications in test/pre-production, Akamas uses reinforcement learning AI, observability data, and safety constraints to autonomously identify and apply the best system configurations to achieve cost, performance, and reliability goals.  Founded by veterans in performance engineering, Akamas counts AWS, Dynatrace, Google Cloud, Gremlin, Mia-Platform, Micro Focus, RedHat, Tricentis, and Splunk among its technology partners. Akamas customers include leading financial services, SaaS software, and online consumer services brands.   Akamas is headquartered in Milan, with offices in Boston, Los Angeles, and Singapore.
Description: Akamas AI safely optimizes application workloads for maximum performance, service quality, resilience and cost.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Synthetic data allows us to responsibly seize the wealth of opportunities AI presents. This is invaluable in sectors such as healthcare, finance, infrastructure, and policymaking. Full Description: Aptus.AI optimizes compliance to transform it into a competitive advantage, by making law digitally accessible. The Italian startup has developed a proprietary AI technology that creates a machine readable version of legal documents, by integrating cutting-edge AI techniques with an homogeneous legal standard. This innovative electronic and standard format offers both an interactive access to legal data and an AI-powered automated analysis on regulations, thus providing humans with accurate and augmented information in a reasonable time. Aptus.AI’s machine readable format is applied to Italian and European financial regulations within an innovative RegTech solution that provides streamlined impact analysis, regulatory trends recognition and more. In fact this SaaS is automatically updated in real-time on regulatory changes and notifies them to users, thus allowing compliance professionals to make faster and more confident decisions, and also to anticipate business opportunities through compliance. With its solution Aptus.AI is bridging the gap between humans and financial regulations, but soon its technology will revolutionize the way people and machines interact with any law.

Full Description: EnerClock is at the forefront of the energy management revolution, providing cutting-edge digital solutions that empower users to optimize their energy usage and contribute to a sustainable future. EnerClock is a central component of this vision, offering a customizable interface that integrates seamlessly with various energy assets, including solar panels, EV chargers, and smart meters. Designed for flexibility and convenience, EnerClock allows users to monitor and control their energy consumption in real time. By providing insights into energy flows, costs, and emission reductions, the platform enables users to make informed decisions to enhance energy efficiency and reduce operational costs. EnerClock also features advanced functionalities such as load prioritization and remote diagnostics, ensuring that users can maintain optimal energy management without the help of onsite technicians. EnerClock’s platform is built on the XENON framework, which connects distributed energy resources into a cohesive system. This integration supports various use cases, from home energy management to large-scale virtual power plants, making EnerClock a versatile solution for both residential and commercial users. The platform is fully customizable, allowing businesses to incorporate their branding and tailor the interface to their specific needs. With robust security features, including two-factor authentication and over-the-air updates, EnerClock ensures that user data is protected while maintaining the latest software capabilities. The company’s commitment to innovation and sustainability makes EnerClock a leader in the energy management sector, driving the transition to a decentralized and sustainable future.
Description: Energy Management, IoT, Artificial Intelligence
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industry Groups: Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation
Full Description: We develop software that generates real-time embedded digital twin solutions for model predictive control and diagnostics of electromechanical systems, enhancing performance, longevity, and reliability. In essence, our toolchain creates a precise digital replica of a physical device, such as an electric motor or generator, in order to accurately model the electrodynamic and thermodynamic behavior of the system across a wide range of operating conditions. We then apply our proprietary mathematical approach to exponentially reduce the computational complexity of this model—so much so, in fact, that our digital twin can be integrated into the device itself to compute in real-time, “on-chip,” as part of an amazingly fast and accurate firmware solution. By accurately predicting temperatures and other critical system parameters thousands of times per second, our Digital Twin On-Chip solutions not only provide unprecedented insight for real-time control techniques to enhance system performance, but also pave the way for data-as-a-service capabilities such as predictive maintenance, monitoring of component aging, and anomaly detection.
Description: We are accelerating the large-scale deployment of digital twin technology in the automotive and automation industry
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Servitly helps OEMs and service providers harness data from connected products to redesign and enrich their after-sales services and processes, through a Cloud-based, configurable IoT application. Through Servitly services also become "Connected". This allows organizations to reduce costs and risks of their after-sales operations, enrich their offerings with IoT-enabled solutions, establish lasting relationships with customers, generate new recurring revenue streams from subscriptions, spare parts and consumables and new service models, like Equipment-as-a-Service. The application is made up of a Connected Customer Portal, giving end customers capabilities like remote monitoring and control, troubleshooting, performance advisory, reporting, subscriptions, spare parts and consumables purchase, and a Digital Control Room, giving all the after-sales professionals capabilities like remote diagnostics, installed base monitoring and alerting, smart proactive maintenance planning, purchase orders management. The software integrates with existing IoT technologies to collect raw data from connected products, processes data to extract actionable information, triggers business processes within other information systems, like FSMs, and provides information and digital capabilities to all stakeholders in the value chain: organization, end customers, third parties. The most distinguishing feature of Servitly is the Console, a no-code environment for configuring all organization-specific application details. Through it, Servitly offers a "buy and configure" alternative to companies that are not satisfied with the "make" of resource-intensive, slow-growing, difficult-to-manage, and incomplete homegrown solutions. Established in 2019, Servitly is now trusted by more than 40 customers in Europe, operating in different industries like HVAC, Food, Water, Energy, Industrial Processing and Packaging, to deliver Connected Services bound to more than 23,000 Connected Products.
Description: IoT SaaS helping OEMs and service providers redesign and enrich after-sales processes by harnessing connected products data

Full Description: ViteSicure is the first insurtech that transforms the policy buying experience by making it affordable, self-service and instantaneous for the multitude of financially vulnerable people. It is the only case of life protection insurance on demand that is sustainable not only because it is completely paperless but also because it's inclusive thanks to products developed directly with RGA, a world leader in life reinsurance. It's also instant thanks open API platform that allows full digital customer onboarding through a need-based product proposition. Last but not least it is self service: in 3 minutes customers in a single process purchase and download the Policy online with the support of digital tools such as the Protection Calculator and the human touch of the excellent omni-digital customer service. viteSicure, brand of the insurance broker Bridge insurance Services is authorized to distribute insurance products in the European Economical Space and guaranteed by a Team with over 25 years of expertise in insurance, marketing and tech. Why viteSicure In Italy, 48% of families do not save, 61% suffer from anxiety about the economic future of the family and only 6% have life protection insurance. This is called Protection GAP (difference between resources needed and available at the death of the head of the family) and is a worldwide problem while companies are still focused on offering savings products, not aligned with the new buying habits of customers, with complicated and old processes, ignoring the millions of financially vulnerable customers. Customers are online, reacting to advertising and using technology and so we believed that digital transformation was the solution to engage customers, educate them about the insurance solution, reduce the distance to insurance and meet the demands and needs immediately. Technology is our enabler for reaching the financially vulnerable. Our open API platform enables fully digital processes not only with insurance companies as is the case with most digital brokers but across the entire value chain thus enabling full transformation and integration of processes. We use APIs for partner integration, for the omni-digital customer service system and even for trustpilot for example. viteSicure is therefore the only one that boasts a fully digital customer onboarding, marketing funnel and customer service that for the customer means a quick and easy journey for a unique insurance buying experience that is aligned with their buying habits. ViteSicure is backed and invested by RGAX (Reinsurance Group of America) and Reale Mutua Insurance Group
Description: ViteSicure is a fully digital insurtech broker that provides financial products with a high premium level digital customer experience.

Full Description: Launched in 2018, dropout is an Italy-based business specialised in the sale of authentic limited edition sneakers and streetwear. With a highly trafficked flagship store located in the centre of Milan, dropout proved a huge success right from the start: over 1000 people attended to the store on its opening weekend, and its doors have seen over 50000 visitors from all over the world.  The e-commerce dropoutmilano.com has seen millions of visitors and thousands of sales, guaranteeing authenticity of all products shipped and providing free delivery across EU. To support the business activities, dropout's team have developed a software of technical analysis for the secondary streetwear market, named HypeAnalyzer. In dropout, pricing and marketing are automated and data-driven by HypeAnalyzer algorithms. Output of these also include data for consignment rates (dynamic and affected by things such as volatility and demand, objectively calculated) and discounts. dropout is looking to scale this, simple yet efficient, model, for many other things retail and e-commerce and is currently studying the creation of a portal for investment in sneakers as alternative assets. HypeAnalyzer is covered by commercial patent in Italy (SIAE, D000014993) and dropout® is trademarked at continental level. Initially opened with no external funding, in October 2021 dropout launched its first funding round, raising €750k via equity crowdfunding in a lightning 6 days, following the board approval of an extension of the initial €500k goal (reached in 4 days out of a 62 days campaign). The move will see dropout open a new retail location as well the opening of several temporary locations throughout Italy; improve its e-commerce and the further development of HypeAnalyzer. The campaign saw the participation of 2 Italian VC funds and over 150 retail investors, who join the founding team made of Kola Tytler, Andrea Canziani, Federico Pasquetti and Stefano Zeppieri.
Description: Business specialized in the sale of limited edition sneakers and streetwear

Full Description: FLEEP Technologies designs and develops printed electronics solutions for the biomedical and smart packaging sectors. The company is a spin-off of Istituto Italiano di Tecnologia. FLEEPtech developed a proprietary process for the fabrication of polymer-based integrated circuits based on Organic Thin-Film Transistors, creating the intelligent core for electronics systems that are mechanically flexible, printed like magazines and recyclable. FLEEPtech is the missing link in the printed electronics industry between a great number of flexible and printed products (i.e. sensors, actuators and energy supplies) that find little space in being integrated with standard non-flexible electronics. For such reasons, the company's mission revolves around the realization of a general purpose platform, namely PrintIC, for the manufacturing of fully-printed systems on chip.
Description: FLEEPtech design and develops printed systems on chip based on a proprietary printed OTFT technology.

Full Description: Rosso is a startup dedicated to eliminating the blood shortage crisis in Italy by serving as a connective tissue in the blood supply chain, collaborating with schools, universities, donor associations, and hospitals. Our primary goal is to reduce patient wait times by increasing the number of donors, particularly young donors. Currently, Generation Z is not donating blood significantly; the average donor age is 45, while donation is allowed from 18 to 65 years old. Through innovative social media campaigns and a booking platform, we raise awareness among young people, encouraging them to book donations at nearby centers and providing instant chat access with hematologists to address their concerns. For companies, we offer a welfare service and sustainability membership that engages employees in health prevention and blood donation. We organize awareness webinars, donation days, and monitor employee health, providing impact reports. These activities are included in the company's sustainability report and contribute to B-Corp certification. Our third pillar involves management software for hospitals. We offer a plugin that optimizes blood stock management in hospitals by managing donor portfolios and the relationships between donors, associations, and hospitals. By knowing the blood stock levels, we can send automatic recalls or alerts when blood is needed and there are donors nearby ready to donate. With the help of AI, we can predict future blood stock needs, required blood types, and the timing of potential shortages.
Description: Making Blood Donations Cool
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Our mission is to protect citizens, businesses and government organizations around the world from the risks of digital: in particular, we are specialists in NOTARIZATION and AUTOMATION of document processes. This means that we turn any digital data into a “DIGITAL ORIGINAL,” authenticated and date certain, which protects against non-compliance with agreements, counterfeiting of contracts and other business documents, theft of intellectual property, trade secrets and commercial know-how. Full Description: Ulisse is the world’s 1st camera-radar fusion device for unobtrusive indoor people counting and tracking. Ulisse is an IoT platform made of proprietary hardware, algorithms and software to deploy state-of-the-art physical space analytics in under 5 minutes. “We help companies adopt Space AI and improve their operations using data insights by developing ultra-low computational sensing devices and AI algorithms” Ulisse by the intelligent use of data can bring new insights and new ability to manage the physical spaces. Founded in 2018, Ulisse develops a novel A.I. technology for the fully automatic detection of peoples and objects in the physical space with unobtrusive, ultra-small, cheap, intelligent and energy efficient proprietary sensors. Ulisse has validated its technology and business model within the Retail sector by: • Collecting people flow data from the physical retail store with the use of a IoT platform with embedded AI powered vision analytics and radar technology; • Transforming raw data into real-time conversion metrics, inside and outside the retail stores; • Analysing people track for real-time flow prediction and providing contextual insights in the right-time; • Fostering the adoption of the physical space AI by leveraging the strong marketing&sales channel provided by leading partners. Ulisse is made of talented visionaries with a huge expertise in the Retail sector who are leveraging the cutting edge computer vision innovations to deliver actionable insights to the big brands. We are a technology enabler with a common objective: to provide Retailers with the most scalable, reliable and secure technology while helping them to get the most from the tons of data grabbed from their phisical stores and take real-time actions.

Full Description: HOLO is the first integrated active cycle management platform designed by Freelancers for Freelancers.  Holo offers services specifically designed to help freelancers track their key metrics, get paid in fiat currencies or cryptocurrencies, as well as request automation of recurring payments, with automated e-invoicing. Holo will be the first product to enable freelancers to pre-authorize payment systems, by credit card or via SEPA.  With Holo, so you no longer have to prepare an invoice! As soon as you receive a payment, our system will automatically create the document in electronic format and send it to the SDI.  Holo is therefore a Fintech product that was created to automate the process of the active cycle of freelancers, a reality that has numerically exploded in the last 3 years both in Italy and in Europe.  Our billing system is accredited by the SDI (Italian interchange system) and already complies with the European Peppol standard. Our system keeps track of your flow by reconciling payments and invoices: you'll have everything ready for drafting the flat-rate accounting. It can all be integrated with the accounting systems already present on the market. The open-banking system will carry out all reconciliations automatically. Finally, we will be the first SaaS ever to bring order and transparency to crypto payments!  Holo is therefore a Fintech product that was created to automate the process of the active cycle of freelancers, a reality that has numerically exploded in the last 3 years both in Italy and in Europe.  see our ppt presentation: https://bit.ly/getholovisualdeck

Full Description: We are an innovative start-up in the B2B sector of precious jewelry. We have made an important innovation in production and in distribution that allows the jeweler to be the protagonist inside of their business and to have a very important saving compared to traditional purchase channels for precious jewels. If you are a jeweler, thanks to our platform you can create a jewel precious to your brand by choosing from over 100,000 unique items by customizing each detail according to your needs. The jewels are 100% made in Italy, in Valenza, by the same craftsmen who usually work as subcontractors for the brands mentioned in the jeweler is a dealer. These subcontractors are managed with a technological system and innovative that allows the traceability of orders and raw materials on time real. Personalization of the jewel by choosing model, size, type, and quality of the stones, type, and weight of the chain, size of the butterflies. The engraving of your brand will allow you to make your collection unique. High-tech platform that independently manages production through the various subcontractors, checking the progress in real time up to internal quality control. The platform is a system that allows the jeweler to create a line of jewelry under its own brand to retain its customer by playing the role of jeweler and not dealer. Thanks to the disintermediation of realized processes with the platform the value for money is on average cheaper 30% above normal market prices. 97% of jewelers re-direct the credibility that their client recognizes towards a precious jewel branded with a label not known by the consumer and suggested by the jeweler himself. This label affixed by a distributor who had the jewel made by various subcontractors cannot be called a brand because: - Does not make models with identifiable design; - Does not carry out marketing operations to convey the consumer to jewelry. 80% of the precious jewels sold have a classic design and are not purchased for the brand they report. Become a protagonist in your jewelry, retain your customer, increase your margins and offer a better value for money We offer the possibility of being a partner in our start-up to a maximum of 100 jewelers. In fact, We are selecting some jewelers to make them an active part of our project.  For us, it is important to have partners who are our references to understand the requests and needs of consumers as well as jewelers themselves. Being our partner means: Participate in an innovative start-up that aims to revolutionize the market jewelry in Italy and Europe, acquiring shares that will multiply the future value;  Enjoy tax deductions of 50% of the invested capital; Receive a course that helps both the owner and the sellers to propose and sell the own-brand jewelry;  Transparent knowledge of data, analysis, and margins that the platform applies; Have a fixed and clear discount that allows the partner to buy with a price lower than normal customers will do in the future; Being able to create a jewelry configurator with the brand and colors of your jewelry; Being able to integrate a custom configurator on your own site to offer a customization experience to your customers. Are you a jeweler? Sign up for free by accessing our portal or writing to us,  we will send you an information document and we will contact you by phone to tell you about the additional benefits enjoyed by our partners.
Description: An innovative start-up in the B2B sector of precious jewelery.

Full Description: The new frontier of conversational platforms. IIO is the open B2B2C VaaS (Voice-as-a-Service) ecosystem built around the person, his needs and emotions. The “person” at the center, IIO ecosystem is: •	EMPATHIC, Recognizes the emotions of the speaker and adapt the conversation dynamically. •	SECURE, thanks to Secure Voice data “pulverization” technology, guarantees security and privacy of data, making users the owners of their information. •	RECOGNIZES YOU, recognizes the speaker, his habits, preferences and needs. •	CONTEXTUAL, drives the conversation based on the original Intent, managing the context switching and fallback based on conversational history. •	MULTI-CHANNEL AND INTEROPERABLE, manages handover on different channels and devices by integrating third-party services. It also offers the possibility to create new applications through APIs and SDKs. •	OPEN, cross-market solution can be easily configured and integrated in several different domain and verticals. •	CONVERSATIONAL EDITOR, ready to use “Low/No-code” graphic tool powered by Artificial Intelligence, for creating Conversational Contexts. Easy and Intuitive UI, create new Conversation, Services and Verticals will require only the knowledge of the specific domain, market and business. NO programming skills required, NO time and effort spend in train the ability. IIO is the ideal VaaS Solution for multiple Services and Verticals, such as: •	Personal Home Usage •	Customer Care Management & Support •	Hospitality … and many more

The sorption AWGs use adsorbent and hydrophilic materials that capture atmospheric water and release it when heated up, just like a sponge.

Full Description: Clubbing - Profilo Crunchbase Descrizione: Clubbing è l’app leader in Italia dedicata alla nightlife, progettata per connettere i clubbers con i migliori locali ed eventi. La piattaforma offre un ecosistema completo per prenotare biglietti, tavoli VIP e pacchetti personalizzati, oltre a gestire in modo efficiente la promozione e le operazioni per i club. Con oltre 200.000 utenti registrati e un transato di 4 milioni di euro, Clubbing sta trasformando il modo in cui la nightlife viene vissuta e gestita, unendo innovazione digitale e semplicità d’uso. Value Proposition: Clubbing è progettata esclusivamente per il settore della nightlife, offrendo: 	•	Per i club: Strumenti per la gestione di biglietti, tavoli e liste d’ingresso, con una dashboard analitica per monitorare le performance in tempo reale. 	•	Per i clubbers: Un’esperienza semplice e intuitiva per scoprire, prenotare e vivere serate personalizzate nei locali più esclusivi. Differenziazione: A differenza di piattaforme generaliste come Ticketsms, Clubbing è specializzata nella nightlife. Questa verticalità ci consente di offrire: 	•	Funzionalità mirate per i club: Gestione avanzata di tavoli e ingressi, marketing personalizzato e strumenti di promozione. 	•	Un’esperienza unica per gli utenti: Suggerimenti basati su preferenze e posizione, oltre a un sistema di prenotazione intuitivo. 	•	Fees competitive: Una struttura di costi ottimizzata per supportare il successo dei locali. Mercato: Clubbing si rivolge esclusivamente al settore della nightlife italiana, con un focus su: 	•	Club e organizzatori di eventi: Strutture di piccole e medie dimensioni che vogliono digitalizzare i processi. 	•	Clubbers tra i 18 e i 35 anni: Giovani attivi, orientati al digitale e alla personalizzazione delle esperienze. Dati chiave: 	•	Fondazione: [anno di fondazione] 	•	Sede: Milano, Italia 	•	Utenti registrati: Oltre 200.000 	•	Transato: Oltre 4 milioni di euro 	•	Investitori principali: Pirallini, Vellutini, De Matteis, Alessandro Bechelli Mission: Rivoluzionare il mondo della nightlife, digitalizzando ogni aspetto dell’esperienza notturna per club e clubbers, creando connessioni più semplici e sicure. Vision: Diventare il punto di riferimento per la nightlife, unendo tecnologia, dati e community per ridefinire l’intrattenimento notturno. Contatti: 	•	Sito web: clubbingapp.it 	•	Email: info@clubbingapp.it 	•	LinkedIn: Clubbing su LinkedIn 	•	Instagram: @clubbing.app Categoria: Software per eventi, E-ticketing, Nightlife.

Full Description: Voice is the future, because it is the most natural, simple and time-saving way to communicate. So, people won’t need anymore a phone to shop, consume contents or interact with their favourite brands. While in the old display world users are accustomed to interacting with brands through their websites and mobile applications, in the voice world they can do so through voice applications. So that any company can implement its own voice application to allow its users to interact to obtain information, news, access services, make purchases. Full Description: Empethy is a digital platform that aims to facilitate pet adoptions in Italy. In particular, people looking to adopt a pet can choose their own location (region/city where they are looking to adopt), apply a number of filters to find their perfect match (e.g. size, weight, gender, age, compatibility with elderly, other animals, etc.) and send the application form directly to the shelters by filling out the online form. Once the adoption request has been sent, users will be able to access their own private area where they will be able to monitor the status of their request (online form accepted/rejected, the face-to-face meeting passed/rejected, adoption accepted/rejected). In addition to this, Empethy offers a personalized online consultation service in order to provide an array of useful tips and advice aimed at "preparing" the future adopter for a conscious and responsible adoption of the future dog/ cat. On the other hand, animal shelters, rescue groups, volunteers can upload their adoption ads easily and quickly by filling out a standardized online form containing all the information needed for a conscious adoption decision (e.g. personal data, vaccinations/castrations, special needs, pathologies, etc.). Once created their own profiles, associations will be able to access their private area, where they will be able to manage all incoming requests (accept/reject the online form, accept/reject face-to-face meeting, accept/reject adoption) for each individual pet in a more standardized and automated way. Empethy's mission is to encourage responsible pet adoption in order to ensure a long-term relationship between humans and animals and prevent the abandonment of other animals. When selecting a companion animal for life, the compatibility of the personality traits, needs, and lifestyle should always be considered. Indeed, each animal has its own history and needs, which may or may not correspond to the lifestyle and needs of the future owner.
Description: The first Italian platform that is changing the way people find, choose and adopt a pet!
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Creators of an innovative road safety technology solution, Oraigo is at the forefront of developing an ecosystem based on brain-computer interface technology, alongside comprehensive mobile and web applications. The company harnesses advanced, patented technologies, incorporating precise statistical models, proprietary datasets and artificial neural networks. This sophisticated system is adept at monitoring and actively detecting brain patterns, providing critical interventions against driving drowsiness and microsleep events. The flagship product, AiGo, coupled with its mobile and web applications, leverages EEG technology — recognized as the gold standard in drowsiness detection. This presents a unique and effective strategy in preventing accidents attributed to microsleeps, while also offering valuable insights to both individual users and fleet managers, aimed at enhancing overall fleet safety. Oraigo's solutions, particularly beneficial for professional drivers, stand out for their practicality, efficacy and ease of use. By offering these technologies through a SaaS model to trucking companies, Oraigo significantly elevates road safety and driver well-being.

Full Description: Pixies is a hi-tech startup that has developed a zero-impact system that combines Autonomous Mobile Robots, equipped with AI, and smart solar-powered benches, in which the robots are stored and re-charged. The system was created to solve the cleaning problem in urban contexts directly through the city. Indeed, the mobile robots are little autonomous sweepers, which are able to get around the surroundings whilst collecting waste and avoiding obstacles, both static and dynamic, to then dock inside the bench and be charged thanks to solar energy.  Our aim is to develop an urban space which takes advantage of IoT devices, scattered around the city, to constantly sense and respond to the environment, while collecting useful data that will improve the management of the entire urban realm.  Pixies’s strength is its bottom-up approach to the problem of cleaning within cities, which ensures a very high level of efficiency, since it is a 24/7 on site, quick and sustainable solution. Moreover, thanks to the presence of the smart benches, we will have fixed charging stations directly installed around the city, thus giving a new piece of urban furniture, useful both for the environment and for the citizens. It's important to point out that the implementation of Pixies for cleaning purposes is only the beginning. Please, bear in mind that this system can be used within cities for a thousand other applications (delivery, first aid, mobile charging for vehicles, etc.), always remaining bottom-up, efficient and sustainable because it is embedded with the urban space. The competitive advantage of Pixies is its bottom-up approach to the problem of cleaning. Indeed, Pixies integrates the robots directly into the city, through the use of smart benches as charging bases for them. So far, Pixies has installed the prototype of the robot and the smart bench in the courtyard of the mixed-use building ( residential, hotel and offices) where the company is based, here in Rome, making it active and supervised by ourselves every day.  The system works perfectly. It's able to operate up to 8 hours per day, covering an area of 2'000 sqm, both indoor (300 sqm) and outdoor (1'700 sqm).  As results, the cleaning efficiency has been increased of about 30% and the related cost has been, therefore, reduced of about 40%. Our closest competitors are : Trombia, Enway, Idriverplus, TSM. However, we can also add to these other companies that have developed solutions for the autonomous indoor cleaning. These are, for instance: Fybots,Cyberdyne, Avidbots, Adlatus and Makita.
Description: Pixies is a hi-tech startup that designs solutions for Autonomous Cities and a more sustainable future of our planet
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Cyberneid is an innovative startup specializing in artificial intelligence, electronic identity, and blockchain. Cyberneid designs, creates and manages services and software/hardware solutions, mobile and desktop, for: - the use of the electronic identity card; - the electronic passport; - the digital signature and certification of documents in compliance with the eIDAS regulation; - identity-proofing reinforced with Deep Learning; - eKYC optimized with Machine Learning and Deep Learning; - secure onboarding and strong authentication; - the management of virtual electronic identities on smartphones. - the blockchain especially regarding NFT and SBT. Cyberneid develops customized software, supplies SDKs and complete kits for ID-proofing, onboarding, eKYC, strong authentication, and digital signature procedures, and provides consultancy and training in blockchain, cybersecurity, and ICT security. Cyberneid is also a SPID service provider accredited by AgID. Cyberneid, for customers in the fintech, PA, healthcare, and utility sectors, has collectively certified over 1 million electronic identities and signed over 1.5 million documents while apps published on app stores have received over 1.5 million downloads. Among the main customers, Cyberneid includes: in Italy IPZS, PagoPA, Namirial, Campus Biomedico University of Rome, Don Gnocchi Foundation; in Croatia Zagrebacka Banka; in Azerbaijan the Ministry of Technology (MCHTC), AzInTelecom, AzPul.
Description: Cyberneid develops and offers solutions for identity proofing, KYC, digital signature, biometric recognition, biometric payments.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Slymetrix Analytics is a tool that monitors in real-time the status of e-commerce traffic and sales in relation to planned objectives. It is a tool that allows every executive and operations manager to check, at a glance, the results of online sales in relation to the expected objectives for the period.  It can be installed and configured in just a few minutes without the need for any specific technical skills. Thanks to intuitive dashboards, it shows in real-time the results of visits and sales that the online shop is producing. In addition, with special indicators, you can see at a glance whether performance is good or bad. Slymetrix Analytics also offers the possibility of displaying dashboards in 16:9 so that they can be transmitted live on a TV monitor: if placed in your office, it allows you to quickly check the real-time performance throughout the day. In addition, the advanced versions allow the definition of advertising campaigns in the various digital media channels, building an inventory of channels organized by traffic providers. Once the definition is complete, for each channel of each campaign the platform generates a tracking url, through which it will be possible to monitor the performance of the campaigns and those of the digital media channels.  In conclusion, with Slymetrix Analytics every e-commerce retailer can boost its performance by optimizing its media investment by monitoring results according to budget forecasts. Why investing: Because Slymetrix is the key tool to enable e-commerce to improve its performance and thus achieve the expected economic goals (increase sales and profit by at least 30%). The e-commerce market is growing steadily and today has around 15 million online shops.  Because we have developed a 100% scalable Full SaaS business model, cloning successful international models with the intention of attracting the attention of large international groups interested in acquiring the startup (exit).  Because our goal is to achieve an exit within 3/5 years of incorporation that will allow investors in this round to get x10 return.  Market: Slymetrix is positioned in the Business Analytics Software Platforms market. The global Business Analytics Software market size was valued at $53.68 billion in 2019 and is expected to reach $120.27 billion by 2027, registering a CAGR of 10.5% from 2020 to 2027. Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence: We have laid the foundations for evolving our mathematical algorithms into Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence systems that will make decisions on behalf of platform users. The aim is for the tools themselves to suggest how to manage investments in order to improve performance.
Description: E-Commerce Business Analytics SaaS Tool
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Mine Crime is the social impacting project of the Innovative Startup (also recognised as a benefit corporation) SAFETECOM Srl SB, devoted to a clear vision: revolutionising the paradigm of urban security management. More precisely, Mine Crime is a software (progressive web-app) that, thanks to a proprietary algorithm, collects and systematises data on urban offences (by accessing both big data online and offline) within the first Italian thematic database accessible to corporates, citizens and any interested stakeholder. This makes it possible to provide citizens, corporates and public administrations with the first digital observatory (interactive Web-GIS) on urban micro-crimes updated in real time. In addition, thanks to our underneath analytical systems, Mine Crime is able to process and produce composite urban-risk indicators as predictors of criminogenic phenomena. In this way, citizens and corporates can benefit from a safer environment and therefore from lower social, collective and individual costs to be incurred because of crime and urban decay.

Full Description: Peeki is an innovative startup born at the end of 2020 with the idea of ​​bringing the world of online and offline shopping together and working in synergy. What problem does it solve? A large number of purchases are concluded online due to lack of information: we did not know that the pair of trousers we were looking for, that particular size, was available in a shop in our city. Peeki promotes the purchase model that is called “ROPIS”: Reserve-Online-Purchase-In-Store. Through the proprietary marketplace it offers a service that allows: - The physical store to have a "Plug & Play" technological solution which operates on different levels of integration, capable of digitizing the warehouse, indexing products, making them visible and available online, in order to satisfy an highly geolocated users’ demand. Through the dashboard it is also possible to manage customer loyalty services such as discount and cashback campaigns, as well as the sale of gift vouchers. - The user has an online service which allows checking, in real time, the availability of products in the nearby stores, book the desired item, go directly to the store and decide whether to complete the purchase. What does it translate into? - saving of time and stress for the user due to continuous searches and phone calls. Buying in the store means trying and touching, no returns due to a wrong purchase. - economic support for commercial activities in the area - relationship of trust and loyalty that develops between customer and seller - makes it possible "last minute" purchase, which the e-commerce model cannot satisfy due to logistical reasons - benefit for the environment in terms of environmental impact resulting from CO2 equivalent emissions and packaging avoidance, as natural consequence of the drastic reduction in returns and reverse logistics (on average 1 out of 4 online fashion purchase is returned)
Description: Peeki is an innovative startup born with the idea of ​​bringing the world of online and offline shopping together and working in synergy.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industry Groups: Information Technology, Software
Full Description: MyTutela is a personal security app that collects and stores digital evidence that lie on the smartphone, with forensics criteria. MyTutela collects texts messages, phone calls register and media, stores all information on a dedicated cloud and applies to each file a unique and universal algorithm that certifies its authenticity and immutability. For any digital evidence to be valid in Judicial proceedings, the integrity of the data must be proven. Given that there is often a high risk of alteration of data stored on devices, it can be difficult to prove the chain of custody. The application serves to avoid these issues by providing somewhere to store proofs in a forensically sound manner, even when the phone is lost and damaged. It is designed to tackle the difficulties that victims of stalking, harassment, bullying and other online offenses, face in providing evidence when filing a report. The app indeed produces a report, which can be printed and attached to a Police Complaint. Thus it encourages and supports victims to report crimes or offenses. Through the analysis of the utilized jargon, the context and frequency of the phrases used in the gathered files, MyTutela AI identifies the presence of risk elements for the users and suggests them the right professional to contact (lawyer, psychologist, forensics consultant), from its own database.
Description: MyTutela is a personal security app that collects and stores digital evidence that lie on the smartphone, with forensics criteria.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: iUP S.r.l. is an innovative startup dedicated to the design and marketing of smartphone applications of its own conception. After its establishment in May 2018 by two operating shareholders and four capital shareholders, a prestigious investor joined the company in January 2020.  The company boasts a large and solid structure, based on the Open Innovation model, which currently has six people in the internal team, each of whom is responsible for a key area for the evolution of the project, who coordinate a total of twenty external collaborators.  Its operational HQ is located in Lomazzo, at the ComoNExT Scientific Technological Park, to which iUP got access after winning the "Business Incubator 2018" tender, promoted by the Chamber of Commerce of Como and by ComoNExT itself, emerging as the best startup among dozens of participants.  iUP is focused on the development of 2REC, an application designed to revolutionize the approach to voice messages and, more generally, to bring audio communication between people to a more advanced stage - an ambitious project that has allowed it to obtain numerous awards and is offering the company the opportunity to follow a significant path of internationalization.  For example, it has passed the selections for the "Global Startup Program" twice in a row; this is an initiative of the MISE promoted on the national territory. In 2019, this allowed it to participate in a three-month acceleration path in Silicon Valley at the Plug & Play Tech Center headquarters, one of the most renowned accelerator hubs in the world, while next summer, it allowed it to access the "International ScaleUp" program, also in the United States, at the "Mind The Bridge" accelerator in Los Angeles.  At the same time, ICE (the Agency for the promotion of Italian companies abroad) has called iUP twice to represent Italian tech innovation at the "Mobile World Congress" in Barcelona, the most prestigious mobile sector event in the world. After the 2020 presentation (unfortunately canceled following the Coronavirus emergency), it will participate in the 2021 iteration next June. Also, in collaboration with the ICE, iUP recently took part in the GITEX Future Stars in Dubai, the main technology event in the Middle East, and at the latest summit (this year in virtual form) of CES in Las Vegas, the most important digital-tech fair in the world during which the giants of the sector present their leading products.  Finally, iUP is among the candidates for being part of Italy's delegation at EXPO2020 in Dubai, which will have innovation in digital communication among its main themes.
Description: iUP S.r.l. is an innovative startup dedicated to the design, development, and marketing of smartphone applications of its own conception.

Full Description: Arbitryum is the Big Data enabler for the new generation of data-driven Price Comparison Websites (PCWs). They need to rethink the user interaction switching from a one-shot-visit website to a multi-channel approach with longer term relationship. Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Science and Engineering
Full Description: Officinae Bio’s mission is to become the leading platform for building with biology.  Our platform integrates purpose-built experimental protocols, proprietary datasets and advanced design algorithms to accelerate product design and development, from personalized cell therapies to precision fermentation. Officinae Bio comes from the Latin word officinae meaning “the shop where things are designed and manufactured”. Our name reflects our mission to become the leading platform for biology design and build.  What are we building? We’re working to overcome the greatest challenges to a future built with biology; starting with the DNA at the core of all biological engineering. Vulcanus - automated pipelines for long and complex DNA constructs Vulcanus is the first AI-driven pipeline to automate the entire process of building large and complex DNA; from oligo design to fragment assembly. Vulcanus is capable of designing optimal protocols for the build of long and complex DNA constructs up to 50kbp at a 93% success rate - nearly double the success rate of industry standard in time frames that make possible rapid development and screening cycles. Named after the latin god of the forge. Vulcanus was believed to have built the most sophisticated items of ancient lore, including Jupiter’s lightning bolts and Mercury’s winged helm. Ulysses - navigate biological complexity to design superior products Having mastered DNA build, we are developing solutions to the next bottleneck to building with Biology: design.  Our Ulysses algorithm is enabling the smart navigation of complex option spaces when designing biological systems such as cell lines and strains. Ulysses leverages approaches for the design of the whole system rather than engineering individual parts. By recognizing the interconnectivity of all parameters and their nonlinear interactions of the system it allows for more robust, scaleable biological production and designs. Ulysses was the legendary Greek hero and king of Ithaca. His most famous journey was his ten-year struggle to return home through challenges and obstacles but he cleverly navigated through them with his wit and intellect. Next generation, scalable production systems With the foundations of DNA and design mastered, we are turning our unique approach to complexity, computation, automation and molecular biology to build the next generation of biological production systems.  Our unique approach aims to overcome the challenges to scalability, predictability and purity of microbial production systems.
Description: Biological design and manufacturing platform, from DNA synthesis to whole organisms.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Founded in Milan, Italy as a spinoff of Politecnico di Milano University, Moi is the first company in the world to 3D print in continuous thermoset fiberglass a new, unique shaped 6.5 meter boat called MAMBO (Motor Additive Manufacturing BOat). Moi’s vision is advanced composites any time, any place, any shape. Moi won several prizes for its innovative Continuous Fiber Manufacturing (CFM) technology, including the prestigious Italian “National Innovation Award” and the JEC Innovation Award, and has partners and early adopters in robotic automation and industries such as aerospace, marine, energy, transport and biomedical.

Full Description: smartFAB is an off-the-shelf industrial analytics platform that empowers manufacturers of all sizes to optimize production while improving quality and reducing waste. The solution employs automated machine learning and other forms of AI to rapidly and efficiently deliver actionable and explainable, cross-functional insights so that shop floor technicians, engineers and managers of all skillsets can monitor, analyze, and predict the operational performance of their manufacturing processes.  smartFAB is a machine learning as a service (MLaaS) solution. The company distributes its product direct to manufacturers (B2B) and via partnerships with manufacturing solution providers (B2B2B). The company has adopted a subscription revenue model and tiered pricing strategy, meaning manufacturers pay additional fees for higher levels of insights. It offers unlimited users. Full Description: Trusty, an innovative startup founded in 2022, specializes in blockchain-based end-to-end traceability solutions tailored for the agri-food sector. This platform, in development since 2020, currently benefits over 70 Italian companies. Trusty has acquired extensive expertise in the chocolate industry, having implemented their platform in three major industries. This implementation facilitates the tracking of over one hundred cooperatives and more than fifteen thousand farmers across seven countries. Leveraging this experience, Trusty is now revolutionizing the cocoa industry. They've launched a blockchain-enabled marketplace, which adheres to both the European Union Data Regulation (EUDR) and the Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence (CSDD). This marketplace is designed to promote ethical sourcing of high-quality cocoa by fostering direct connections between responsible producers and the industry. Trusty's platform not only enables transparent trade but also provides micro-financing opportunities. This initiative is pivotal in creating a more sustainable and equitable cocoa supply chain, ultimately benefiting cocoa farmers and the industry alike.
Description: Trusty is make conscious choices is a right of every consumer.

Full Description: Readalyze supports students in forming reading habits through our EdTech platform.  In a world where reading is neglected more and more each day, Readalyze is taking a new approach to remind students that reading is fun. We bring books to life using AI, creating immersive experiences that foster lasting reading habits and deepen students' love for books. Our platform adapts to each student’s strengths and weaknesses by design, personalizing every interaction to encourage growth and development. Beyond enhancing the student reading experience, Readalyze empowers educators with powerful analytics tools that provide real-time insights into individual and class-wide progress. Teachers can easily track key metrics related to language acquisition, emotional intelligence, and critical thinking, allowing them to tailor instruction to meet each student's unique needs. Based in Milan and founded by passionate book lovers from Bocconi University, Readalyze is more than just a platform—it’s a movement to redefine the future of reading and education. Whether you're an educator, a parent, or an investor seeking to make a meaningful impact, join us in shaping the next generation of readers. Follow us on LinkedIn and Instagram for the latest updates and innovations in educational technology!

Full Description: Dock3 - The Startup Lab is the entrepreneurship program of Roma Tre University. It is aimed for 34,000 members and about 100,000 graduates of the 12 Departments of the University, but is also open to students, graduates and researchers who can contribute their skills to the development of a business project for the RomaTre students. The course derived from the University's desire to invest on the entrepreneurship of the students, as well as the commitment and passion of two University professors: professor Paolo Merialdo (Engineering Department) and Carlo Alberto Pratesi (Department of Business Studies and University Delegate to Startups). Both professors are cofounders of InnovActionLab , which has trained more than 800 people and has given rise to over 40 startups in 4 years. The program is coordinated by Andrea Dal Piaz, engaged for more than 10 years in training and support for entrepreneurial development in Italy and in Africa. Dock3 - The Startup Lab is a program of the RomaTre University, in collaboration with " Started ", a project funded by the European Commission designed to develop the entrepreneurial skills of researchers.

Full Description: EG MEDIA is a For Benefit innovative start-up, publishing an online magazine analyzing brands' claims on Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) topics  In 2018 22% of commercial during the Superbowl were on goodvertising and 15 out of 27 of the Cannes Lions awards were handed to purposeful campaigns . Both in terms of the absolute numbers and relative percentages, corporates are now creating more award-winning work with a higher purpose, compared to non-profit. Unfortunately, there are a lot of ‘purpose driven campaigns’ created for companies that aren’t actually facing a radical change. Our mission is to strengthen the importance of truth-in-advertising and help brands improve their discourse on sustainability.  The project aims to develop a solution to determine the trustworthiness of brand claims on Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) topics through Artificial Intelligence. If we succeed, we’ll allow consumers to get safe information about sustainable actions companies advertise. We’ll also let sustainable and responsible companies play within an equitable and fair arena against crafty competitors.
Description: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR SUSTAINABLE BRANDS
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Founders: Alessandro Lazzari, Andrea Ferrante, Marco Pugliese
Industry Groups: Energy, Internet Services, Sustainability, Transportation
Full Description: The idea behind Walle Mobility is to allow air travel in a simple and fast way, in just one click. Walle’s mission is to revolutionize urban and interurban mobility in the next 10 years, operating within the UAM (Urban Air Mobility) market, in strong worldwide expansion. Walle’s mission is to eliminate traffic and allow movements first interurban and then urban avoiding hours and hours of traffic from the city. We want to start with Milan. Milan is one of the most mature cities in Europe as sharing mobility. From 2004 until today, Milan Municipality signed agreements with seven car-sharing operators, eight scooter-sharing operators, and three bike-sharing operators. Urban Air Mobility (UAM) is going to be a real opportunity and we would like to launch the service during Milano – Cortina 2026 Winter Olympic Games. Air Mobility would be the best solution to smartly move both athletes and wealthy travelers between different areas of cities. AIR - Since the beginning, our goal has been connecting ground-to-air with a click: so-called “taxi drones” have been included in our project. Nowadays UAM is just a project, an idea, and taxi drone services seem to be only a product of an SCI-FI writer but, then: why are we considering it? As said above, UAM offers incredible potential and a revolutionary scenario of travel between cities and suburbs. People's minds will soon be ready, authorities are working towards it, manufacturers are building, testing and certifying their aircraft while Walle is… already there. We want to be one of the first UAM service providers in the world because we strongly believe that this method of transportation, will allow both passengers and goods to travel very quickly through the cities with a fraction of relative costs. As part of the business model, we will be also renting the facilities like vertiports to other operators that will come afterward. By 2050 we will be ten billion on Earth! Of these 10 billion, almost seven billion will live in urban centers. Imagine the cities of the future. Imagine the links between regional cities and imagine the traffic! The biggest problem in the cities of the future will be one: traffic. Imagine the traffic pollution. Imagine the travel between one city to another that will become slower and slower. This problem will be very dangerous also for the people who will use your car for regionals travel. Cities link will be slower and the stress will growth.
Description: "Walle allows you to make short/medium-range air travel in half-time, eliminating traffic stress through a simple, and fast service. "
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Information Technology, Other, Privacy and Security, Professional Services, Software
Full Description: Legal-tech platform for the creation and certified exchange of documents with legal value between users. The system identifies, in a legally relevant way, the users and divides them into categories. Each category can perform different operations.  The documents can be of any form and can be "sent for viewing" or, if required, transferred. Some examples: - Documents issued by a body attesting a quality: e.g. degree, the university creates (or uploads) the certificate on the platform and sends it to the graduate. - Documents issued by an entity and which can pass from hand to hand: e.g. guarantee certificates or bearer bonds. Our first product: Watch The Watch is a web-based platform that aims to combat counterfeiting and fraud in the luxury watch industry. The manufacturer will generate a digital certificate of guarantee and authenticity that will follow the watch throughout its life cycle, automatically updating the information over time. In this way, users and intermediaries will be able to prove, even in the second wrist market, that the watch is original and not stolen. The user application will be used both to store the certificates and to transfer them after sale.
Description: Send and track your documents with the legal value superior to traditional methods. Easy, fast and intuitive
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industries: 3D Printing, Dental, Education, Health Care, Medical Device, Software
Industry Groups: Education, Health Care, Manufacturing, Software
Full Description: Oral3D is the startup bringing 3D printing to dentists. The Oral3D package has all it is needed to create 3D printed models of the patients’ oral cavity with no effort. The Oral3D software and 3D printer do not require any technical knowledge or training. It takes just a couple of minutes to process and send to the 3D printer any CT scan, cone beam or intra-oral scan.  Oral3D models improve dentist-patient communication, which is associated with more accurate diagnosis, better commitment of the patient during the treatment, improved outcomes, and less likelihood of complaints or litigation. In addition, the models support treatment planning and surgical rehearsals, favoring greater efficiency and accuracy.  The use of 3D printing models in dental offices is nowadays crucial in the communication between patients and dentists, making the planning of the treatment easier and increasing the satisfaction. Also the use of the model makes it easier for the dentist to plan the intervention, avoiding to directly plan it in the patient's mouth and decreasing discomfort. Last but not least, the 3D models can be very useful in seminars and lessons, where normally are used standardised models that don't really reflect a real patient's situation. Oral3D offers a unique solution, made by 3D printer and software, the only one existing capable of directly translating a CT Scan into a STL file, ready to print. Normally it takes technical help, money and time for a dentist to translate a CT Scan into a printable model, Oral3D's software does it automatically in a few minutes.
Description: 3D Printing for dentists
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: When visiting a website, people may be at home, in the office, on a train, or anywhere in the real world. But they are also on a web page. That page is like a virtual place where they may meet other people. However, traditionally a web visitor didn’t have any means to know if he or she was the only one on that page at that moment or if there was anyone else. With Now4real, web visitors can see in real time how many people are actually displaying that page. And they can chat with one another. This way, web pages become live virtual places, and browsing the Web is like going around in the real world: wherever they are, people see if there are others around them (presence counters), and they have a chance to interact with them (pagechats).
Description: Now4real connects the people who happen to be visiting the same web page at the same time, enabling the birth of instant communities.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Natural Index aims at promoting a sustainable approach to search engine optimization, based on a profound understanding of algorithm dynamics and on the employment of natural practices. The company is exclusively focused on natural search engine optimization and is part of an international group with offices in Italy and San Francisco (US). Born as a group brand from the partnership between two companies that were active since 2008, "Natural index Group" became Natural Index Srl in October 2021, absorbing the operational structures of the two entities. Thanks to one of the founding companies' background as a software developer and system integrator, the Natural Index’s SEO team has the ability to dialogue with software engineers in order to ensure the most effective technical and architectural choices for the search engine. Today, Natural Index is one of the top SEO agencies in Italy and aims at becoming one of the leading international players by pursuing a hyper-specialisation strategy in order to promote the skills and experience acquired over years of work, optimising hundreds of projects, including some of the most important international websites. The Natural Index team is composed of some of the most respected SEO specialists in the world. Among its founders there are professionals that started doing SEO in 2003. The knowledge gained through the optimization of some of the biggest websites and the passion for natural and ethical SEO make our team the ideal partner to successfully develop any organic visibility project in local and international markets.

Full Description: Each year more than 250 million people live outside their Country of birth. 90% of global migration today is due to economic reasons. People move to find better work and life opportunities. Mygrate is an online marketplace that connects them to Migration Experts. The platform pre-assesses migrants and provides migration professionals with quality leads which let them make money offering viable solutions for relocating. Migrating is a life-changing experience that exposes people to a significant investment of psychological and emotional resources. Mygrate facilitates the process by providing a direct contact with a migration expert of choice. Mygrate also enables migration professionals to promote their business and improve their online presence. International mobility is rapidly increasing. Migration is a resource, but it needs to be better channelled. Mygrate aims to optimize it while empowering all the people involved in the process. Individuals have better and reliable information. Professionals expand and improve their business. Organisations streamline the process to find more and skilled resources from anywhere in the world. Migration has many aspects and impacts on our society in different ways. Considering the global scale and nature of the phenomenon, profoundly embedded in the human life, Mygrate can easily include additional related services, expand to any Country and become the go-to hub for all migration matters.
Description: Migration Experts Marketplace

Uno dei principali vantaggi offerti da Walery è la sua flessibilità. Gli utenti possono scegliere liberamente i servizi a loro necessari, in modo da poter ottenere la soluzione più adatta alle loro esigenze. I server dell'azienda offrono anche una serie di strumenti di sviluppo per aiutare i clienti a creare e gestire i loro siti web, tra cui cPanel, PHP, MySQL e molto altro ancora. Full Description: They live in a generation where the use of social media is becoming too important for their lives. In addition to sharing information and content, social media have become very popular because they allow people to use the internet to establish personal or business relationships. It is said that social media serves to compensate for the lack of sociality of the modern and post-industrial era. But is it really possible to define ‘sociality’ an interaction or approach among individuals in a totally virtual way? Social living should be built on natural social interactions. They should go back to verbal confrontation, to communicate through words, looks, and try to avoid confrontation with other individuals just behind a computer screen or a smartphone. But if a person wants to organize a real activity involving other people using some popular social media, how can he organize it without first knowing these individuals? For those reasons It’s been developed a new platform to promote the return to classical social interactions and to get to know new people without the use of instant messaging, promoting the ‘face to face’ socializing instead of a virtual acquaintanceship, this innovative platform allows people to organize activities all over the world involving all its users, without having to personally know the participants in the activities, and without having to spend hours in front of a keyboard or a phone screen.
Description: Plansaround promotes the return to classical social interactions and to get to know new people without the use of instant messaging.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Carofiglio represents, with its story, fashion and elegance in Cosenza since 1926. It opens its exclusive store, Carofiglio Junior, specifically dedicated to kidswear in 1995, with many representative and prestigious luxury brands. Our fashion store is placed in Corso Mazzini, the main street of shopping in Cosenza, which is now also the hearth of MAB: Bilotti open Museum of Contemporary Arts, where modern sculptures and fashion create together a perfect union. Carofiglio Junior and its team offers you all its know how to give you a special and unique shopping experience, a glamorous itinerary among luxury Italian and International top brands . Here you can find all neon colors from Kenzo’s fashion jungle, the funny and iconic prints by Moschino, the street style by Dsquared2 with its distressed denim, the comfortable and innovative fabrics by Stella McCartney. You will discover all the baroque elegance by Young Versace with its micro studs and Medusa buckles, Sicily theme and precious brocades by Dolce & Gabbana, a glam rock style with Philip Plein and its studded leather. If it’s not enough, you can chose a simply perfect English style for little ladies and lords with Burberry, candy colors and weightless chiffon, Swarovski and precious details by Miss Blumarine. If you are really fashion addict you can’t do without “mini me” Fendi logo bags and scarves, Versace precious mini shoulder bags and flats, Burberry change bags and trench coats, Stella McCartney little monsters and super heroes, Chloé pale romantic colors for newborn or Little Marc Jacobs extravagant colored prints. Our web site is a wide showcase of the most important fashion brands of the world so that you can choose only all the best for your kids. Carofiglio Junior guarantees you the authenticity and the high quality of each single item of clothing and accessory for a perfect and secure shopping experience.

Industries: Art, E-Learning, Museums and Historical Sites
Industry Groups: Education, Media and Entertainment, Software, Travel and Tourism
Full Description: ArtCentrica is an innovative startup and an EdTech solution that addresses the education market, a growing sector, reinforced by the pandemic situation. In this context, the cultural digital transformation has become an increasingly urgent need, and at the same time it also has made the development of new ways of teaching and learning. Therefore, guaranteeing access to cultural heritage online is fundamental for our future. ArtCentrica, has been designed and developed since the end of 2019 by Centrica - Italian company leader in Digital sector for the cultural heritage enhancement -, and allows teachers and students to visualize in intimate detail, compare, virtually measure, correlate artworks, and create lessons that can be used inside and outside the classroom.  The cloud application contains more than 7.000 artworks from global museums like Uffizi Galleries, Brera Museum, the MET, Rijksmuseum, Central Graphic Institute in Rome, Cleveland Museum of Art, Finnish National Museum, Museo Egizio, Reims Musée des Beaux-Arts, Art Institute of Chicago, SMK (Statens Museum for Kunst), Staedel Museum and 30 Florentine views, with images in very high resolution, up to 10 GigaPixel for each artwork.  It is possible to appreciate intimate details of masterpieces from Leonardo da Vinci, Botticelli, Caravaggio and other hundreds of artists, due to GigaPixel images and enabling technologies, with a quality of images and associated knowledge that is not available in the market.  Because of its valuable features, ArtCentrica has been recognized among the best ICT tools for teaching and learning by Reimagine Education 2020 (December 2020) and has been awarded by National Geographic in GESAwards That’s Geography special track (January 2021). Moreover, ArtCentrica has been selected for the following acceleration/prizes: Third Call of the European project IMPACT EdTech (November 2021) FuturED’s acceleration path (January 2022) by CDP Venture Capital SGR - National Innovation Fund Accelerate Italy acceleration for US market  (July 2022) FoundersBoost acceleration program (August 2022) CultTech acceleration program (September 2022) Global Startup Program in San Francisco (October 2022) Apollo Awards 2022, shortlist “Digital Innovation of the Year” (December 2022)
Description: ArtCentrica the art learning revolution
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: WhoTeach is a B2B intelligent digital learning platform that helps training institutions and companies to create and deliver high-quality online courses by optimizing the use of resources. The platform enables an easy management of synchronous and asynchronous training through the synergy between its components, their modularity and adaptability to various training contexts. It is equipped with AI to support teachers and experts in creating and managing training paths in a customized manner. The platform consists of four distinct and individually usable modules:  ● WT Artificial Intelligence is an innovative Recommendation System (RS) developed with Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques, which supports lecturers in searching and selecting teaching material, using resources contained in internal or external repositories. The Recommendation System suggests the most suitable resources for the course based on the rules set by the lecturer. ● WT Learning Management System is a learning management system that allows high quality courses to be created and delivered asynchronously, with flexibility in course structure and materials to be made available. In addition, it offers a number of sophisticated learning verification and learner activity tracking systems. ● WT Live is a tool for delivering training in synchronous mode, through virtual classrooms equipped with numerous features to facilitate interaction between teacher and learners and between learners themselves. The virtual classrooms offer the possibility of creating break-out rooms, where learners can work in groups, and have tracking tools to certify learner attendance. ● WT Social E-Portfolio is a tool for tracking skills and publishing information related to educational and professional experiences, which also allows students to share ideas, create communities of practice and interact with other students, lecturers and experts.
Description: WhoTeach is a B2B digital intelligent learning platform that helps training institutions and HR managers to create online courses

Thanks to a proprietary management software specific for underwear, which optimizes the management of the assortments, Unyli aggregates traditional stores into a purchasing group and integrates with primary underwear brands. The affiliated stores also become the "territorial hubs" to which the orders collected through Unyli e-commerce site are diverted.  Unyli's mission is to lead the underwear supply chain into a new world, both physical and digital, combining both the values ​​of tradition with flexibility, simplicity and the typical efficiency of digitization. All the decisions that need to get made, nobody taking the lead, and the conversation dying out. Trippers is here to solve this problem and make your next trip a reality. An idea that spun from personal experience, we got together as a group of friends to create what we've always dreamed we'd have, a travel assistant that walks us through each step of the travel planning process, from the early days of simply deciding on a date for the trip to the final decisions of where to stop for coffee on our way.  Trippers will be launching in Q1 2021, here to reunite you with your friends after a whole year of social distancing!
